Today, we are joined by Dr. Janea Wright, a licensed Naturopath Doctor (ND) with the Saskatchewan Association of Naturopathic Practitioners and the Canadian Association of Naturopathic Doctors. Dr. Wright owns her own practice and works 1:1 with patients in person and virtually. She now offers online group education programs to obtain greater reach and help empower more women to take their health back into their own hands.
During this episode, we dive into the world of naturopathic medicine, focusing on Janea’s inspiring journey and why she became a Naturopathic Doctor. Join us as we explore the core aspects of her practice, the role of Naturopathic Doctors, and the valuable benefits they offer. Whether you’re new to naturopathy or seeking to deepen your understanding, this episode has something for everyone.
We talk more about:
Janea’s journey to naturopath
Pivotal moments that shaped Janea’s approach to wellness
Janea’s mission and practice
Understanding Naturopathic Doctors
Benefits of seeking a Naturopathic Doctor
The foundation of nutrition
Fundamental principles of nutrition to overall health
Importance of balancing blood sugar
Main principles of naturopathic medicine
Applying the pillars of a healthy life
Acts of self-care
Connect with Janea:
Website
Instagram
Don't forget to subscribe and leave a 5-star review.

Thank you so much for being a part of the SHEmpowers community; until next time!
Lead with love and joy!
